  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_108674</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108674</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bar magnets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabmagneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Barres aimantées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ímãs de barra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Magneti di barra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνήτες ράβδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imanes de barra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations for the determination of magnetic poles. This illustration shows two hanging magnets far apart from each other whose poles are directed by the arrow.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen für die Ermittlung 
der Magnetpole. Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei hängende Magneten 
weit abgesehen von einander, wer Pfosten durch den Pfeil verwiesen 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations pour la 
détermination des pôles magnétiques. Cette illustration 
montre deux aimants s'arrêtants loin indépendamment de l'un l'autre 
à qui poteaux sont dirigés par la flèche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações para a 
determinação de pólos magnéticos. Esta ilustração mostra 
dois ímãs de suspensão distante aparte de se de quem pólos são 
dirigidos pela seta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni per la 
determinazione dei poli magnetici. Questa illustrazione mostra 
due magneti appendenti lontano oltre a vicenda di chi pali sono 
diretti dalla freccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων για τον προσδιορισμό των 
μαγνητικών πόλων. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο 
κρεμώντας μαγνήτες μακριά η μια εκτός από την άλλη οι της 
οποίας πόλοι κατευθύνονται από το βέλος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones para la 
determinación de polos magnéticos. Esta ilustración muestra 
dos imanes que cuelgan lejos aparte de uno a de quién postes son 
dirigidos por la flecha.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabmagneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetpole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">barres aimantées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôles magnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">magnétisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólos magnéticos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
